patterns.match: \b(sup|bye|set|to|print|ask|if|then|end if|else|repeat|end repeat|while|end while|for each|end for|define|function|end function|return|try|catch|finally|end try|import|from|as)\b
patterns.name: keyword.control.sup

patterns.match: \b(is greater than|is less than|is equal to|is not equal to|is greater than or equal to|is less than or equal to)\b
patterns.name: keyword.operator.comparison.sup
